title: Small items of research equipment at Queen's University, Belfast
abstractText: Research infrastructure is critical to the delivery of internationally leading, high impact research. The funding will enable significant development of the equipment base within QUB in the areas of energy, ICT, the digital economy and healthcare and provide an opportunity to increase to upskill the early career researchers as well as develop the research profiles of early career academics in areas of significant technological importance to the UK. All the equipment has been identified and will be used to benefit the entire university by incorporating the instrumentation into the shared equipment database developed within QUB.
